string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find devil friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we devils have some etiquette.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in devil culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find devil friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we devils have some etiquette.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in devil culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find devil friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we devils have some etiquette.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: 我睡下去就不想起来了

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: 我现在不是正在说话嘛

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: 你有没有嫉妒过别人呢？

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: 你想通过和我亲近，来摆脱嫉妒的纠缠吗？

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: 就让嫉妒使你远离所有人吧！！！

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: 如果你能让我产生嫉妒，那我就认可你！！！

string.name: s4
string.value: 魔族也懂得要守护自己在乎的东西。

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: (应该坐下来并保持安静，装作谁都不在～)

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: 坐下来对减肥没什么好处……

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: 我腿短……所以站着和坐着没区别吧？

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: 你知道坐在天上是什么感觉吗？

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: 一坐下就感觉到了大肚子……

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: 难道是因为肚子饿了？咋就一点力气都没有……

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: 好歹是我主人……我偶尔也要听话……

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: 主人！现在不是休息的时候！

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: (吃葡萄不吐葡萄皮……为什么不吃葡萄倒吐葡萄皮呢……)

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: 又没有做错……干嘛对我发火……

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: 你干嘛……我该怎么办……你好可怕……

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: 我活着可不是为了听这些话的……

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: 爱情是很幸福的一件事

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: 虽然很害羞，但是太好了！

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: 我看出来了，你是骗我的！

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: 主人！你得看着我说才行！

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: 这，这该让我如何是好啊……

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: 你是不是也对其他宠物这么说啊？

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: 我刚刚已经去过厕所了！

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 我便秘呀，你在戏弄我吗？？

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: 演奏竖琴真的很有意思！

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: 我想和主人你一起玩耍。

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: 我变成了人偶也不要忘了我。

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: 听说海底深处住着一个魔女……

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: 别让我做一些我不想做的事情。

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: 今天也要度过愉快的一天

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: (天上也有像我一样的天使吗？)

string.name: f4_s
string.value: 好吃得我都要流眼泪了……

string.name: s3
string.value: 你好像没资格成为我的主人！

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: (应该坐下来并保持安静，装作谁都不在～)

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: 坐下来对减肥没什么好处……

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: 我腿短……所以站着和坐着没区别吧？

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: 你知道坐在天上是什么感觉吗？

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: 一坐下就感觉到了大肚子……

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: 难道是因为肚子饿了？咋就一点力气都没有……

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: 好歹是我主人……我偶尔也要听话……

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: 主人！现在不是休息的时候！

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: (吃葡萄不吐葡萄皮……为什么不吃葡萄倒吐葡萄皮呢……)

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: 又没有做错……干嘛对我发火……

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: 你干嘛……我该怎么办……你好可怕……

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: 我活着可不是为了听这些话的……

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: 爱情是很幸福的一件事

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: 虽然很害羞，但是太好了！

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: 我看出来了，你是骗我的！

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: 主人！你得看着我说才行！

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: 这，这该让我如何是好啊……

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: 你是不是也对其他宠物这么说啊？

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: 我刚刚已经去过厕所了！

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 我便秘呀，你在戏弄我吗？？

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: 演奏竖琴真的很有意思！

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: 我想和主人你一起玩耍。

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: 我变成了人偶也不要忘了我。

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: 听说海底深处住着一个魔女……

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: 别让我做一些我不想做的事情。

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: 今天也要度过愉快的一天

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: (天上也有像我一样的天使吗？)

string.name: f4_s
string.value: 好吃得我都要流眼泪了……

string.name: s3
string.value: 你好像没资格成为我的主人！

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: 看来你偶尔也会下一些不错的命令嘛。唧唧~

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: 坐下去的感觉真好~吱吱~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: 唧唧~你也坐下来休息吧~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: 我好像听到有人说话……没有吗？唧？

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: 唧唧，你不也更喜欢站着嘛~

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: 正巧我的腿有点酸了……主人，你很善解人意啊~ 唧唧~

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: 对我这样的身体，简直是小菜一碟！吱吱~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: 啊哈哈哈~ 舒服~真舒服~ 唧~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: 主人你也坐下来一起玩吧~吱吱？

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: 怎么能坐在这种地方，主人？吱吱？

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: 主人，你也太会开玩笑了。吱吱。

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: 我到外面的世界已经是第几天了？

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: 其实，对主人命令感到厌烦而已，吱吱~

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: 主人和我一起摇尾巴~吱吱？主人，你没有尾巴？

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: 坐了之后还能看到蓝天，挺好的~吱吱~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: 主人的命令，我什么都听~吱吱~

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: 吃得好饱，天气也很好~~主人对我更好~

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: 现在已经到了可以不听主人命令的等级了…吱吱

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: 其实，主人也不喜欢坐在这种地方吧？对吧？吱吱？

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: 哪来的猴子在吱吱叫~听不清了~吱吱。

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: 肚子都快饿扁了，还要我坐下来干什么…有没有人给我拿点香蕉啊，吱吱。

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: 竟然会因这种事情发火…吱吱！(哐哐哐！)

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: 你，你没有发很大火吧？唧唧？?

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: 我是因为喜欢你才那样做的……呜呜……

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: 竟然被人类给训了…吱吱！

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: 生气了~生气了~生气了~吱吱！

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: 我的心不会因此而受伤的。呜呜……

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: 谁说我挨主人的骂就会哭的？我是绝对不会哭的……呜呜！

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: 我以后会小心的…不，一定会小心…吱吱

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: 主人，你以为发火就能让我听话吗？呜呜，吱吱…

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: 我讨厌生气的主人……吱吱……

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: 要生气的应该是我才对，为什么是主人发火？吱吱！

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: 你刚才是在骂我吧？我都听到了…吱吱！

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: 我不是听了那样的话才哭的……呜呜~这只是雨水罢了。呵呵……

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: 居然对我发火……主人你好过分。呜呜呜呜~ 嗯嗯……

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: 又不是什么大事，主人还大发雷霆…

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: 以前还说喜欢…吱吱…主人原来是骗子啊？

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: 饭都不给还训我！哪有这样的？吱吱！

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: 跟你说了不是我做的~不是我，为什么不相信呢~ 唧唧~

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: 你训谁呢？我的岁数可比主人你的大哦！

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: 你说我长的像猴子是吧？！我不是猴子！吱吱！

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: 哈哈哈，是开玩笑的吧？吱吱？

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: 你也真是的。说的什么话嘛，让我在这种地方？唧唧？

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: 虽然很害羞，但是主人的命令~吱吱~

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: 按时便便也是很重要的事情，知道吗？吱吱！

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: 唧唧~拉好啦。拉好啦~呃~好丢人啊~

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: 帮我望望风，别让别人看到~ 唧唧。

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: 我都没吃东西怎么拉得出来呢？唧唧？

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: 又不是猴子，人类竟然会说出这种话…吱吱

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: 原来主人是这么毫无常识的人啊…吱吱…

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: 唧唧？唧唧？是不是我耳朵里进了什么东西？我好像听到了很奇怪的话呢。

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: 你眼睛闭着的吧？绝对不可以睁开哦。唧唧！

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: 我要大大方方地拉便便~这没啥难为情的！不对，还是稍微有点难为情……唧唧！

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: 主人，都为你安排了地方，你再不做就太失礼了吧？吱吱？

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: 我等级过高，已经听不进去主人的命令了。吱吱。

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: 只有猴子才会在这种地方便便，不是我。吱吱。

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: 为了管理我的人气，决定禁止做那些动作了，吱吱。

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: 我活到现在500多年，从来没在外面随地便便。唧唧。

string.name: c13
string.value: 好事|可爱|漂亮|美丽|惹眼|靓丽|很漂亮|很美丽|真靓丽

string.name: c14
string.value: 好事|可爱|漂亮|美丽|惹眼|靓丽|很漂亮|很美丽|真靓丽

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: 就算听了那种话，也没啥高兴的~ 唧唧~

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: 我一直以为是假话！是真的吗 唧唧！

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: 唧唧~身体想怎么动就怎么动~

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: 干嘛用那种色眯眯的眼神看着我？吱吱

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: 你是真心的吗？你的品位还真特别啊…吱吱…

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: 从人类学会那样的话也…吱吱

string.name: c15
string.value: 好事|可爱|漂亮|美丽|惹眼|靓丽|很漂亮|很美丽|真靓丽

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: 这身体肯定是最为珍惜的 吱吱

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: 有一点点开心…嘿嘿，吱吱

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: 唧唧~主人你也真是的~那种话让我好难为情啊~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: 屁股扭扭~吱吱~尾巴翘翘~吱吱~

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: 别开那种玩笑，一点意思都没有。吱吱。

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: 主人，你在期待什么回答？吱吱？

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: 我觉得我比较粗狂……唧唧。

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 那种话我听得太多了，都倒胃口了。呵呵。

string.name: c16
string.value: 好事|可爱|漂亮|美丽|惹眼|靓丽|很漂亮|很美丽|真靓丽

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: 主人，我非常生气。是真的~

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: 你真的那么认为吗？真的？嘻嘻！嗯嗯，这句话太熟悉了？吱吱？

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: 恩？没什么可开心的。不过好奇怪，刚刚我的尾巴动了呐

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: 好讨厌嘛！那种话！嘿嘿！真讨厌

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: 现在那种话让我好有压力。主人。嘿嘿。

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: 好，好吧。主人你也非常漂亮，非常可爱。你想听这句话吧？

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: 唧？肚子饿死了，你称赞我有什么用。

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: 对我关照是不错，不过有点烦…

string.name: c17
string.value: 我爱你|我的爱|喜欢你|爱你

string.name: c18
string.value: 我爱你|我的爱|喜欢你|爱你

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: 啊，怎么回事？怎么会紧张呢。吱吱。

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: 唧唧？我的心情变得好奇怪。怎么会这样？

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: ......嗯嗯，唧唧。我可以相信那句话吧？

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: 唧唧唧……我好像陷入爱河了……

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: 唧？那是什么东西？吃的东西？

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: 谢谢……真是有点不敢相信。唧。

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: 主人，你是不是哪里不正常啦。唧唧。

string.name: c19
string.value: 我爱你|我的爱|喜欢你|爱你

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: 唧唧……虽然我早就知道，不过亲耳听到后真是好幸福啊……

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: 这，这算是喜欢吗，主人？吱吱？

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: 唧唧……居然收到主人的告白……有点小开心呢……

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: 我对你的爱快要满到冲破我的身体了……唧唧

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: 主人，你的心意我领了，快给我吃的吧。吱吱。

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: 唧唧？主人，你不觉得那种话很无聊吗？

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: 你用那种表情说话，令我难以相信啊。主人……

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: 人类就跟人类谈恋爱啊？总不能单身一辈子吧…吱吱

string.name: c20
string.value: 我爱你|我的爱|喜欢你|爱你

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: 这，已经熟悉了，我也不在乎了。看到了桃心那是因为看走眼了！吱吱

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: 主人是个笨蛋！这种话要小声说！别人会听到的！吱吱~

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: 那，那种话让我好害羞呐……虽然心里很高兴，主人。唧唧。

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: 唧唧唧唧……我怎么动不了呢……是不是因为太高兴了？

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: 如果你常说这种话，就会没有可信度了，主人……

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: 你要想说奇怪的话，趁早走开，主人。吱吱

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: 唧……我知道你很孤独，但也不能跟一只宠物告白呀……

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: 不要拿猴子和本大爷相提并论，吱吱~

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: 武陵是个不错的地方~不过，无法和我现在待的地方相比。唧唧。

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: 唧唧~就算是500年前，我也能轻而易举打倒雪人……

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: 唧？你别问我宠物饲料的味道怎样。你自己吃了就知道了。

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: 又没什么话可说，让我说什么啊，真是…

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: 唧唧……？说话？我不太会说话！

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: 我现在没心情说话……唧唧……要说你说。

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: 唧……肚子饿死了，怎么说话。你给我东西吃，我就考虑考虑。

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: 做个人偶还真不爽，还不如关在监狱里。

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: 唧唧？让我的尾巴别动？你在说什么嘛。我的尾巴哪里动啦？

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: 我讨厌饥饿，更讨厌被训，但是最讨厌的是丢下我不管。吱吱

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: 唧唧唧……我没法和其他宠物对话。我和它们语言不通。

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: 主人你先说，我才能说…吱吱。

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: 别总是冷不丁地给我下命令。哎。

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: 以前说的时候，你不是嫌我烦吗？吱吱？

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: 对着宠物喋喋不休，看来你很无聊啊，主人。唧唧？

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: 唧。你问我变身术是怎么用的？嗯，我倒是很想告诉你，不过你能听懂吗？

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: 你问怎么才能腾云驾雾？不能说只有骑宠才算是技术吧~吱吱！

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: 说实话，其他宠物一点都没有时尚感，吱吱。至少应该戴个头饰吧？

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: 以前还有个朋友，长得像水怪又像猪…叫什么名字来着？

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: 如果换做是主人，你会说什么呢？吱吱？

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: 公共场所不能喧哗。主人，呵呵，你应该克制一下自己的行为才行。

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: 说~话！……现在行了吧，主人？唧唧？你真的很烦唉。

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: 我没什么话想说……再说了，主人，我跟你也不是很熟啊！唧。

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: 到了睡觉的时间了~吱吱…

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: 还是躺在云彩上睡觉最舒服…吱吱…

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: 唧……你不睡吗？你看上去很累的样子……

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: 还没给我吃饭，绝对不能睡！吱吱~

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: 现在睡觉还太早了，吱吱？

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: 唧？居然让我睡在这种地方……

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: 主人你也一起睡吧，吱吱…

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: 根本就不困，主人还让我一直睡觉！让人可疑哦！吱吱！

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: 唧！为了更好地施展变身术，就应该珍惜睡觉的时间！

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: 饭都不给我吃，就知道让我睡觉，太过分了主人！吱吱！

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: 唧……主人，希望你也做一个好梦……

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: 唧？正好我也醒了那么久了，有点困了……

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: 我在做实验，能不睡到什么时候！吱吱！

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: 等我睡着了你肯定会丢弃我的！绝对不睡觉！吱吱！

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: 不困，这个黑眼圈不是因为困，而是因为肚子饿！吱吱！

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: 看吧！看我华丽的变身！吱吱！

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: 怎么样？看到我变身了吗？吱吱？

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: 嘿！你应该把两只眼睛睁大点，一眨眼的功夫就可能错过哟！

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: 你要让我做那么困难的事情吗……唧唧……

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: 嘿嘿……主人你自己都办不到，就别老让我去做呀！

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: 饿着肚子，我根本就变不了身！吱吱！

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: 只要是主人的命令，我什么都能做！嘿啊~吱吱！

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: 为了主人，我学会了变身术！吱吱！

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: 唧唧唧~ 我对那个可是非常有自信的！好吧，那么，变身！

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: 自由市场肯定有卖会变身的宠物吧？吱吱?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: 你又不好好看，干嘛还让我变身啊？吱吱！

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: 唧唧……你不是说过，我变身后的样子很可笑嘛！

string.name: f2_s
string.value: 唧~是吃的~哇~好久没吃东西了？！

string.name: f3_s
string.value: 唧唧！多吃点的话，应该就能像以前一样施展法术了吧？

string.name: f3_f
string.value: 唧唧……真难吃……主人，没有好吃点的东西吗？

string.name: f4_s
string.value: 唧唧~主人给的东西我都喜欢！

string.name: f4_f
string.value: ……在我不想吃东西的时候硬要我吃东西，主人你真讨厌……唧唧……

string.name: s2
string.value: 嘴巴险恶，我不会说那种话~吱吱！

string.name: s3
string.value: 主人，为什么总让我说奇怪的话？吱吱？

string.name: s4
string.value: 我讨厌说那种话。应该说点好听的~嘿嘿~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: 做的好吧？表扬我吧~！汪汪！

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: 汪汪~ 我是一只英姿飒爽的哈士奇~！

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: 汪~我偶尔也想变成一只不听话的哈士奇~

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: 汪~！我是做什么事情都很出色的哈士奇~！

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: 为了我，每天只让我做简单的事情吧？汪汪？

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: 汪汪……坐太久了，我都烦了……

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: 汪汪~好奇怪，我坐不下来……

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: 汪~主人~很抱歉……我办不到……

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: 汪~只要能和主人在一起，做啥都行！

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: 汪汪~！为了主人，我已经认真练习过了~!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: 看到主人高兴，我也很开心~汪汪！

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: 汪汪~！屁股好痛……没办法趴下来……

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: 主人~偶尔也给点难度啊~汪汪！

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: 汪汪？主人~你只管着发号施令，却不看我一眼。这怎么行啊！

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: 汪汪汪~对主人应该表示忠诚……

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: 以后不会再失误的~汪汪！

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: 对不起~我不再做坏事了~汪汪！

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: 汪~主人，我什么都听你的~！

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: 请消消气吧…我就只有主人一个人…

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: 汪~！你就包容一下我的错误吧！

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: 汪汪~我一向非常听你的话~难得做错一次事情呀！！

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: 主人，我要讨厌你了…汪汪…

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: 小小失误就不要在意~汪汪！

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: 不是我做的…这是误会！汪汪！

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: 汪汪~我是一只聪明的哈士奇！

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: 汪汪？主人你明明也是笨蛋~

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: 汪汪~如果主人你是这样想的，那就算我是吧~！

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: 你的玩笑很过分啊~汪汪！

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: 汪汪~我很聪明的~你肯定是误会了吧~!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: 汪？你真的是那样想的吗？

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: 我还是喜欢我的主人~汪汪！

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: 汪汪~现在开那种玩笑已经没啥意思了……

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: 我知道你不是真心的~汪汪！

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: 无聊的话就和我一起玩吧~汪！

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: 主人~你是真心的吗？汪汪？

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: 汪汪……我觉得我很聪明啊……

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: 汪汪~就算主人你讨厌我，我也最喜欢你了~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: 我能理解主人的真心~汪汪！

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: 汪汪汪~我是一只内心强大的哈士奇~！

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: 汪汪~总觉得便便里有种特别的气味……

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: 汪汪汪~主人，我也想看看你拉便便~！

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: 还以为是便秘，原来不是~汪汪！

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: 不能便便了，肚子好痛。吱吱…

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: 汪汪~没有可以用来装我便便的袋子呀~

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: 便便~便便~还是便便好~汪汪！

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: 啊…每当便便的时候，总觉得有另一个我…汪！

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: 汪汪汪~主人~你应该清理掉我的便便。~

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: 不能一天到晚一直便便吧~汪汪！

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: 汪~我好像便秘了……呃呃呃！

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: 汪汪汪~等了很久，便便也不出来~

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 主人~便便要去洗手间的~！

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: 汪汪~我的便便没有臭味吧？

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: 主人~你要帮我擦屁股哦~汪汪！

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: 汪汪~瞧瞧我的便便……好大呀……

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: 汪汪~！主人，当心！我的便便就在你脚边……

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: 汪汪……我要明天再拉便便……

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: 主人你都不便便，还让我~ 汪汪！

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: 有了爱人第一个先要告诉我~汪汪！

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: 汪汪~听说，做任务的话，可以赚到钱。~

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: 看到主人的眼神，我就能知道主人的心情~汪汪！

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: 汪汪~我现在正在学习人类的语言~

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: 唧唧……今天天气不好，我心情也不好~

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: 询问密码的运营员肯定是假的~汪汪！

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: 看到主人的脸，我都觉得很幸福~汪汪~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: 听说神木村的深处住着可怕的龙呐，汪汪！

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: 汪汪~给予称赞的话，连鲸鱼都会跳舞……你也称赞我一下吧~

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: 看了今天的运势，说最好不要说话~汪汪！

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: 汪汪？我们不是能用眼神交流的嘛~

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: 最近肚子鼓鼓的~这多亏了主人的厚爱~汪汪！

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: 如果准备了充足的药水，那就不怕任何怪物了~汪汪汪！

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: 偶尔照镜子的时候，我觉得我和主人长得挺像的~汪汪~

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: 汪汪~心情好的时候，我的尾巴会很自然地摇动~

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: 肚子饿了~我们先吃点零食吧~汪汪！

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: 一起坐船远游旅行吧~汪汪！

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: 汪汪……我想听有趣的故事~

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: 就算没人教，我也能做得很好~ 汪汪！

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: 汪汪~ 肚子都贴到地上了~

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: 汪汪？趴下的话，屁股会变大的……

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: 汪汪~趴下的话，就看不见主人的脸了~

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: 给我点时间练习一下~汪汪！

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: 我做得好吧？快表扬我吧~汪汪！

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: 这是我拼命练习的结果~汪汪！

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: 汪汪！只要是主人吩咐的事情，我都要做到！

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: 汪汪汪~怎么样？我趴下的姿势如何？

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: 拉肚子了…蹲下来就腹痛~汪汪！

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: 我还没练好~请给我示范一下~汪汪！

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: 汪汪汪~趴着的话，让我有些透不过气来……

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: 汪汪？我是很听话的哈士奇，对吧？

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: 我是什么都能做的万能哈士奇？对嘛？

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: 不要盯着我的屁股看~汪汪！

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: 只要是主人的命令，我可以摘星揽月~汪汪！

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: 还是坐下来最舒服…汪汪！

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: 汪汪~！好奇怪，我居然做不了……

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: 呜呜……腰好疼……昨天是谁打的……

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: 汪汪~！我做这个还非常吃力……

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: 呜哇~原来我还能做这些事情！汪汪！

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: 汪汪！全身的酸痛感好像全没了~！

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: 虽有些困难~但还是做出来了！汪汪！

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: 小短腿太明显了~嘻嘻~汪汪！

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: 呜呜……这对我来说，还是很难的动作……~

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: 缺乏运动…真心累啊…汪汪！

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: 汪汪~ 我的确应该接受一下行走的练习吧~

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: 汪汪汪~主人，你比我还高呐！！

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: 原来有这么好玩的游戏！汪汪！

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: 我是不是很了不起？竟然能站起来~汪汪！

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: 没力气了……先吃饭吧~汪汪！

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: 好像要向后摔倒似的，太可怕了~我做不到~汪汪！

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: 主人，你太贪了，别要求太多！汪汪！

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: 汪汪~这是你的真心话吗？

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: 你有心上人了吧？对吧？汪汪？

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: 啊~偷偷在便便呢，没有听到…汪汪~

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: 汪~！你是说要给我饭吃吗？

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: 我们家主人是全世界最好的~汪汪

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: 汪汪~主人，你是一个心地善良的人~

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: 汪汪？不要把理所当然的事情大声说出来嘛~

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: 那种话跟你的恋人去说吧~汪汪！

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: 汪~ 我讨厌说“我现在心情很好”这种话~

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: 我感受不到你的真心…吱吱…

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: 我也非常爱主人~ 汪汪~

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: 汪汪汪~！你如果跟其他宠物也讲这种话，我可要生气的哟~

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: 汪汪~！我是世界上最幸福的哈士奇~

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: 主人，玩笑开的太过分了~汪汪！

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: 昨天从巴特斯那里学到的~汪汪！

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: 汪汪~ 哈士奇没有手~

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: 聪明的哈士奇是无所不能的~汪汪！

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: 这个也太简单了吧~汪汪！

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: 汪汪~！你觉得我办不到是吧？

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: 汪汪……这个有点麻烦~我伸伸尾巴行不行？

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: 汪汪！玩些有趣的游戏吧~!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: 汪汪~！你怎么知道我肚子疼啊？

string.name: f3_s
string.value: 世上最好吃的味道？汪汪！

string.name: f4_s
string.value: 汪汪！真是太好吃了！再给我点呗~！

string.name: f4_f
string.value: 我不想变成猪猪哈士奇…吱吱…

string.name: s3
string.value: 别让我说不好的话~ 汪汪！！

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: 怕我站得累才让我坐下的吧，主人你真关心我～

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: 主人，你这是在关心我吗？

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: 坐下的话，就无法尽情玩耍了～我们还是去玩吧～

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: 主人，你是不是觉得我样样在行啊？

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: 主人，我会服从你的任何命令～

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: 看到主人满意的样子，我也很开心～

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: 主人，你刚刚说什么？我没听见～

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: 主人，我可不可以躺下来？？

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: 请你别生气～我会反省的～

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: 我太善良了……所以才受伤……

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: 请别生气，主人。我不会再这样了。

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: 即便如此，我还是最喜欢主人你了……

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: 主人，我只是想得到你的关注罢了……

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: 我以后会改正的，这还不行啊～！

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: 我既诚实又善良～你为何老对我发火呢？

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: 主人，你消消气的话，～我会亲你100次

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: 主人～我保证以后不会再有这种事了～

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: 哎哟～看在我的份上，就饶我一回吧～

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: 不好玩，主人我要玩别的～

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: 像我这么善良的宠物上哪儿找啊，你居然还对我发火！

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: 你的眼神告诉我，那是假话……

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: 怎么可能……是在开玩笑吧？

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: 每每听到都会让人心动的话～

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: 我的心也是始终为了你的～！

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: 知道了～知道了～你的心意我领了～

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: 主人，那你的恋人可怎么办啊？

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: 我可不是那种随随便便的宠物

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: 主人，我喜欢在你身上蹭

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: 现在，我也来表示一下我的心意吧～主人～ 主人～ 怎么样？你喜欢吗？

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: 主人……先去换件衣服啊～这味道～

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: 爱情不是游戏，清醒一点，主人！！

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: 本想叫你主人的～但是我不想说了～！

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: 虽然很害羞，但是主人下令的话…！

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: 啊！主人，能不能思考之后再叫我做啊！

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: 身为冒险家，做事得分清场合！！

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: 总感觉我的便便中散发出一种特别的气息……

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: 没有袋子来装我的便便呀～

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: 啊……我感觉自己长得跟便便很像……

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: 嘿嘿～拉完便便，心情就会大好～

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: 主人，你帮我稍微挡一挡呗～

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: 我的便便一点儿都不臭～

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: 刚才不是便便过了吗～又忘记了？

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: 内急的时候才便便呀……主人，这种事情强求不得！

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 我想嘘嘘…先去嘘嘘不行吗？

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: 这么吵的地方，让我怎么睡嘛！

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: 主人，你觉得现在是睡觉的时候吗？

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: 我刚好特别累，你让我睡觉真是太好了……

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: 如果梦中出现我自己的话就好了……

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: 我等这一刻很久了！晚安，主人

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: 每天只知道睡觉的话会变胖的！

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: 主人，我要在你身边才能睡着……

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: 主人，你的声音就像摇篮曲一样……

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: 主人，我要在你身边才能睡着……

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: 主人，看来你是个瞌睡虫啊。每天只知道睡觉

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: 再命令我，我可要发飙了！

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: 射手村的草地很柔软，我非常喜欢～

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: 主人，你今天太酷了～！我为你着迷了～！

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: 主人，你累的时候~可以找我哟~

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: 出门遇到了可怕怪物的时候，主人请你一定要保护我！

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: 我能开口说话，你觉得很神奇？别总是使唤我行不行啊？

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: 我所说的话……你要替我保密……

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: 最近口味变挑剔了～但是主人给什么我都会喜欢

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: 夜市场的尼奇太油腻了～

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: 玩具城的厂长卡胡叔叔是个很亲切的人～

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: 企鹅与企鹅王之间是什么关系啊？

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: 你的美丽让我无话可说～

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: 最近口味变挑剔了～但是主人给什么我都会喜欢

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: 偶尔做好事的人会得到精灵们的推荐～

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: 我们家主人全世界最厉害！

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: 主人，你没有恋人吗？要不要我帮你介绍？

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: 我的梦想就是让你幸福～

string.name: f1_f
string.value: ……居然让我吃到吐为止，主人，我讨厌你……

string.name: f3_s
string.value: 好吃得我都要晕过去了～

string.name: f4_f
string.value: 唔…吃太饱了，不能再吃了…

string.name: s3
string.value: 我是一只不说脏话的宠物～

string.name: s4
string.value: 你对别人怎样，别人就对你怎样！

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: 我本来就想休息一会儿～

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: 你不是也更喜欢站着嘛～

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: 有时候这样坐下来休息也不错啊

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: 我要像男子汉一样道歉！

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: 对不起。我的确有些松散

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: 主人你别这样，我已经真心在反省了。

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: 这是干嘛，不做不就行了

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: 你自己就没有错吗～ 你想拿我怎样……！

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: 走夜路时，你给我小心点。

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: 呼……就算能够年轻1岁的话……

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: 有时我也觉得自己很可爱

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: 你别以为我会被那种话所糊弄。

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: 即便如此，我对你也不感兴趣

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: 说点像样的话行不行啊

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: 我是做事干净利落的宠物

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 你真是个不懂礼貌的家伙

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: 还是你睡吧。我看你眼睛下面都有黑眼圈了～

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: 我是因为想睡所以才睡的。并不是为了听你的话才睡的。

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: 只要你安静点，应该就能睡觉了。

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: 不要！不想睡觉！不要强迫～！

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: 都因为你，我现在睡意全无

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: 你别走，否则我会眯着眼睡的哦

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: 我既然睁着眼睛，就说明我不想睡，懂不？

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: 我没什么话可说的，你让我说什么啊。你真是的……

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: 你想跟我说话，还不够格！！

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: 看来并不是头大就聪明

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: 能打赢扎昆吗？我看赢不了…

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: 要按时给我吃饭，不然可能会跑掉的。

string.name: s1
string.value: 没资格当人类，你代替我被关进去吧！

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: 主人，你这是在关心我吗？

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: 这样坐下来就可以了吗？

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: 坐在柔软的地上，感觉太好了~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: 玩剪刀石头布，输的人就坐下~啊，对了！我不是人类~

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: 正好想休息，你能理解我太高兴了~

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: 主人，我可不可以躺下来？？

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: 哪不舒服吗？干嘛一直想要休息？

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: 呼呜~别训我~我很喜欢你的~

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: 为什么要这样对待可爱的我呢！！

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: 今天在学校里被欺负了？

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: 主人，你的话我听不明白！

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: 傻瓜傻瓜~！！主人你是个傻瓜！

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: 正在反省呢~请饶了这一次吧~

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: 主人……对不起，让你伤心了……

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: 主人，请你息怒，我哭的很悲伤~

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: 你真的要训这么漂亮的我嘛~？

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: 这是常有的事情…主人何必…

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: 主人，你怎么每天都误会我~

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: 怎么看怎么看都很喜欢

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: 怎么可能…是在开玩笑吧？

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: 我的心也是始终为了你的~!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: 行了行了。给我杯果汁喝喝呗~

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: 主人，我喜欢在你身上蹭

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: 能有你这样的主人，我很幸福

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: 主人，看来你发现我的魅力了？

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: 爱情不是游戏，清醒一点，主人！！

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: 什么都好~就是太容易表白了~！

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: 虽然很害羞，但是主人下令的话…！

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: 小学的时候上道德课你没学过公共礼节吗！？

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: 身为冒险家，做事得分清场合！！

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: 主人，你也有必要多学学公共道德哦

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: 便便完了总觉得很舒服~

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: 嘻嘻~便便完了，赶紧帮我擦擦~

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: 虽然很害羞，但是主人的命令~吱吱~

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: 我的便便一点儿都不臭~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: 多亏了主人的厚爱，便便也出来了很多~

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: 刚才不是便便过了吗~又忘记了？

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: 我想嘘嘘…先去嘘嘘不行吗？

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 我是爱用洗手间的有文化的宠物！！

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: 一直跑来跑去，都快没力气了。啊~不行了~

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: 相处久了，也知道我该睡觉的时间了~！

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: 每天只知道睡觉的话会变胖的！

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: 我要和主人一起去童话村玩~

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: 给我唱个摇篮曲再让我睡觉！

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: 现在睡觉是不是太早了？

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: 好像跟你说过我想睡觉？

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: 美味的食物~主人温暖的怀抱是最舒服哒~

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: 学会人类的语言没那么容易~

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: 出门遇到了可怕怪物的时候，主人请你一定要保护我！

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: 你去放心狩猎吧~我会在需要的时候为你准备药水~

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: 想聊聊天…但说我太吵了…

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: 从现在开始，我一句话都不说~

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: 啊…天空为什么是蓝色的呢？好伤感…

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: 夜市场的尼奇太油腻了~

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: 和我在一起的话，你的身份是不是也会提高呢？

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: 其实宠物的语言也互不相同~雪人和白虎的语言是不一样的~

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: 今天主人的服装太帅了！

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: 我正在想我该讲什么……你稍等一下~

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: 我们偶尔也用眼神交流吧~

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: 我喉咙疼，没法讲话~给我来杯热茶吧~

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: 你的美丽让我无话可说~

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: 能和主人在一起，太幸福了~

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: 下雪的时候，我好想见到克里夫爷爷~

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: 想知道精灵米乐的消息了~快告诉我~

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: 我听说，神木村的塔塔曼村长喜欢收集东西~

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: 感觉很无聊吗？那就去做功课~

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: 我偶尔想静静地呆一会，你能安静一下吗？

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: 你有什么想说的，就先说吧~

string.name: f3_f
string.value: 唔…吃太饱了，不能再吃了…

string.name: s2
string.value: 太失望了，说出来的话里能看得出性格~！

string.name: s4
string.value: 真正的美是从言行举止中散发出来的~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: 要是我坐在这里的话，大家会被我迷住的……

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: 如果一直能这样吃饭该多好~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: 要是我的屁股变大了，那可怎么办啊……

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: 这里有点杂乱~我得收拾一下~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: 不想坐~坐下来个头就显矮了~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: 啊，感觉好像是来郊游似的~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: 给我饭我就做~肚子饿了…

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: 既然都坐下了，我顺便躺下来行不行？年纪大了…

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: 坐着也能算是个运动呢~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: 我感觉地面都要被我坐凹下去了~

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: 坐了之后，小腹的赘肉就会被看到的

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: 屁股上长痘痘了，很疼的…

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: 你觉得我好欺负是不是？

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: 你就只想对我说这些？我无话可说了!!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: 你少来这套，我一点儿都不怕你~

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: 唔唔……眼泪停不住~好伤心~

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: 我不是听了那样的话才哭的……呜呜~这只是雨水罢了。

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: 饭都不给还训我！哪有这样的？

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: 给我一块糕吃，我就不~~吃你！！

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: 喜欢我的朋友多了去了！

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: 在这里能见到你真高兴

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: 吃饭之前最好不要说这种话…

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: 哎呀~干嘛总是盯着我看？

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: 还以为是便秘，原来不是~

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: 剩下的事情就交给你了

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: 我的便便也挺好看的嘛~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: 我便便的时候也很可爱~

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: 在这种地方便便…真是羞耻~

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: 嗯嗯…主人再多给点泡面…

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: 肚子饿得睡不着~让我吃点肉吧，主人~

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: 睡觉时也要摆正姿势~呼呼…

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: 我要做个早睡早起的宠物

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: 为何每天让我露宿街头啊！！

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: 虽然露宿很浪漫，但今天不行！

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: 让我睡在这种地方，主人太过分了！

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: 你让我干啥，我就非得干啥吗？

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: 我犀利的眼神如何啊？其实很可爱对吧？呵呵

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: 我要长得壮壮的，然后和可怕的怪物对战……

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: 偶尔有人说我可怕……我很可怕吗？

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: 像男子汉的我，太喜欢了~

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: 夜市场的尼奇和我长得挺像的~对吧？

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: 为了锻炼这个肌肉，你知道我多辛苦吗~

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: 我讨厌饥饿，更讨厌被训，但是最讨厌的是丢下我不管。

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: 这世界上最帅的就是我~

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: 我肚子好痒……帮我挠挠呗……

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: 我没什么话要说……倒是有很多想吃的东西！！

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: 主人，你的肚子比我还大哦~

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: 你知道生命水吗？好不好吃呢？

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: 最近看镜子…被吓了一跳！因为太漂亮了~

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: 主人，你再寂寞也不能让宠物说话。

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: 今天说太多了，明天再来。

string.name: f1_s
string.value: 噢~是给我奖励的吗？很好吃吧？

string.name: f3_f
string.value: 把我喂成肥猪可怎么办……

string.name: s1
string.value: 什么嘛？你怎么能说那种话呢？

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: 不是因为我乐意才坐下的~

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: 有时候这样坐下来休息也不错啊

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: 你是在命令我吗？我拒绝

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: 怎么？你想用主人的身份来压我？

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: 我凭什么要挨你的训呢？

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: 这是干嘛，不做不就行了

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: 别看我这样，对这种话我还是有反应的！

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: 既然这样，你给我点吃的吧

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: 说点像样的话行不行啊

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: 打扫卫生就交给主人了！！

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: 我是做事干净利落的宠物

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: 闭上眼睛，感受肠道的蠕动

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: 你不说，我也已经很困了

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: 现在还不是睡觉的时候

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: 只要你安静点，应该就能睡觉了。

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: 你别走，否则我会眯着眼睡的哦

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: 我是因为困了才想睡的，和你的命令无关。

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: 现在还不是睡觉的时候。

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: 我可不是那么懒的宠物

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: 在公共场所应该保持安静

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: 看来并不是头大就聪明

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: 要按时给我吃饭，不然可能会跑掉的。

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: 能打赢扎昆吗？我看赢不了…

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: 别总是冷不丁地给我下命令

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: 现在不想说话！心情不好！

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: (我的表情写着我听不懂~人话。)

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: (吃葡萄不吐葡萄皮… 不吃葡萄倒吐葡萄皮…)

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: 我好像没做错什么啊。坏主人…

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: 我都没犯错... 居然对我撒气…

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: 什么啊... 不管了... 好恐怖...

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: (今天去自由市场购物怎么样~?)

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: 我一定要听到这样的话吗……

string.name: f2_s
string.value: 今天的菜单很合我的胃口啊…

string.name: f4_s
string.value: 太好吃了，我都要流泪了…

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: (应该坐下来并保持安静，装作谁都不在～)

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: 坐下来对减肥没什么好处……

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: 我腿短……所以站着和坐着没区别吧？

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: 你知道坐在天上是什么感觉吗？

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: 一坐下就感觉到了大肚子……

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: 难道是因为肚子饿了？咋就一点力气都没有……

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: 好歹是我主人……我偶尔也要听话……

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: 主人！现在不是休息的时候！

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: (吃葡萄不吐葡萄皮……为什么不吃葡萄倒吐葡萄皮呢……)

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: 又没有做错……干嘛对我发火……

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: 你干嘛……我该怎么办……你好可怕……

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: 我活着可不是为了听这些话的……

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: 爱情是很幸福的一件事

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: 虽然很害羞，但是太好了！

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: 我看出来了，你是骗我的！

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: 主人！你得看着我说才行！

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: 这，这该让我如何是好啊……

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: 你是不是也对其他宠物这么说啊？

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: 我刚刚已经去过厕所了！

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 我便秘呀，你在戏弄我吗？？

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: 演奏竖琴真的很有意思！

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: 我想和主人你一起玩耍。

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: 我变成了人偶也不要忘了我。

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: 听说海底深处住着一个魔女……

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: 别让我做一些我不想做的事情。

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: 今天也要度过愉快的一天

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: (天上也有像我一样的天使吗？)

string.name: f4_s
string.value: 好吃得我都要流眼泪了……

string.name: s3
string.value: 你好像没资格成为我的主人！

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: 不是因为我乐意才坐下的~

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: 要不你也坐下来休息一下？

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: 其实，对主人命令感到厌烦而已。

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: 是在关心我才让休息的吗…主人真好。

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: 怎么？你想用主人的身份来压我？

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: 主人你自己做错了，干嘛对我发火！

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: 我凭什么要挨你的训呢？

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: 下次不会这样了，原谅我一次吧。

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: 主人，没看到我的眼泪吗，原谅我吧…

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: 别看我这样，对这种话我还是有反应的！

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: 有时我也觉得自己很可爱

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: 你的心意我懂，可你不该对着我说呀

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: 你别以为我会被那种话所糊弄。

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: 即便如此，我对你也不感兴趣

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: 像我这么有魅力的宠物可不多见哦

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: 打扫卫生就交给主人了！！

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: 你不说，我也已经很困了

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: 我是因为想睡所以才睡的。并不是为了听你的话才睡的。

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: 都因为你，我现在睡意全无

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: 现在还不是睡觉的时候

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: 你别走，否则我会眯着眼睡的哦

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: 好吧，不过拿什么作为回报呢？你能为我做什么？

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: 你能不能让我休息一会儿？

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: 能打赢扎昆吗？我看赢不了…

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: 要按时给我吃饭，不然可能会跑掉的。

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: 看来并不是头大就聪明

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: 主人，你自己什么都不做，还每天对我指手画脚的！！

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: 别总是冷不丁地给我下命令

string.name: s2
string.value: 没资格当人类，你代替我被关进去吧！

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: 我腿短……所以站着和坐着没区别吧？

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: 你肯定会嘲笑我，坐了跟站着没什么两样！

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: 听说坐下来屁股会变大…

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: 好歹是我主人…我偶尔也要听话…

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: 一坐下就感觉到了大肚子…

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: 难道是因为肚子饿了？咋就一点力气都没有…

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: (挨骂的时候应该老老实实待着吧？)

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: (吃葡萄不吐葡萄皮… 不吃葡萄倒吐葡萄皮…)

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: 又没有做错…干嘛对我发火…

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: 如果我跟其他主人走的话，你会怎么办！？

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: 你的心意我都明白(眼望别处……)

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: 好像大家都在盯着我看……

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: 很抱歉我睡着了……不过，你话太多了……。

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: 听说海底深处住着一个魔女…

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: 我变成了人偶也不要忘了我。

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: 好羡慕企鹅王与白雪人…

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: 你能给足我饭吃就行了……

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: (噜啦啦~噜啦啦噜啦噜啦嘞~一起唱歌吧？)

string.name: f2_s
string.value: 好吃得我都要流眼泪了……

string.name: s2
string.value: 魔族也有需要守护的东西

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: 我的坐姿很好看吧~快表扬我吧~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: 正好我的腿有点酸痛。谢谢你~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: 我的腿又不疼，非得坐下吗？

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: 为了主人，我熬夜练习的~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: 和主人在一起，做什么都可以！

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: 主人！！你说什么我都会做的！

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: 用清晰的口音逐字说出来，主人。

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: 呼呜~别训我~我很喜欢你的~

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: 别用那么吓人的眼神看着我……我好伤心……

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: 今天在学校里被欺负了？

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: 即便如此，我还是最喜欢主人你了……

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: 请你消消火吧…我就只有主人一个人…

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: 我既诚实又善良~你为何老对我发火呢？

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: 主人，你的话我听不明白！

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: 主人你那么说的话，我会很悲伤的…

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: 主人……对不起，让你伤心了……

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: 主人，请用你那宽厚的心原谅我一次吧~

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: 最讨厌毫无缘故就发火的主人

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: 不好玩，主人我要玩别的~

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: 只要是为了主人，做什么都行~

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: 每每听到都会让人心动的话~

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: 因为太激动，我都不知道该怎么办了~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: 就算闭上眼睛、捂住耳朵，我的脑海里也只有主人你~

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: 一定要每天十次说我爱你哦~拉钩~

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: 为了主人，我什么都能做~

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: 我心情好的都要飘起来了

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: 本想叫你主人的~但是我不想说了~！

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: 什么都好~就是太容易表白了~！

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: 主人……先去换件衣服啊~这味道~

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: 虽然很害羞，但是主人下令的话…！

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: 主人，你也有必要多学学公共道德哦

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: 啊！主人，能不能思考之后再叫我做啊！

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: 身为冒险家，做事得分清场合！！

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: 便便完了总觉得很舒服~

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: 便便~便便~你知道便便之歌吗？

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: 为什么…让我做这种事情？

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: 我怎么知道该如何拉便便呢？

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: 便便之后跟我一起玩吧~

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: 我又不是拉便便的机器！！

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: 刚才不是便便过了吗~又忘记了？

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: 你不睡吗？你看上去很累……

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: 现在还不是睡觉的时候…

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: 现在还不是睡觉的时候~

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: 我刚好特别累，你让我睡觉真是太好了……

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: 我想睡觉的时候再睡觉，行不？

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: 主人，现在还没到睡觉的时候！

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: 本该再多陪你一会儿的，不过我现在困了！不好意思啦！~ 主人~！

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: 主人，你要不要一起睡？躺在我旁边吧

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: 饭都不给，竟让我睡觉！主人是个不良主人！

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: 让我睡觉，自己又想去哪玩吧~？？带我一起去~

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: 主人，你觉得我哪里最好看呢？告诉我

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: 出门遇到了可怕怪物的时候，主人请你一定要保护我！

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: 你去放心狩猎吧~我会在需要的时候为你准备药水~

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: 我所说的话……你要替我保密……

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: 我们之间的身份差异太大了，要对话的话，有点……

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: 你问企鹅哭的时候会发出企企的声音？那还真不知道~

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: 和我在一起的话，你的身份是不是也会提高呢？

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: 其实宠物的语言也互不相同~雪人和白虎的语言是不一样的~

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: 今天已经很累了，主人呢？

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: 你的美丽让我无话可说~

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: 玩具城的厂长卡胡叔叔是个很亲切的人~

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: 很无聊吗？如果很无聊就陪我一起去做美容吧~

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: 最近口味也上了档次~但是主人给什么我都会喜欢

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: 下雪的时候，我好想见到克里夫爷爷~

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: 能和主人在一起，太幸福了~

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: 到水上市场就可以看到长的像我一样的石头！

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: 我们家主人全世界最厉害！

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: 感觉很无聊吗？那就去做功课~

string.name: f3_s
string.value: 好吃得我都要晕过去了~

string.name: s1
string.value: 说点好话就行了，不是吗？

string.name: s3
string.value: 你对别人怎样，别人就对你怎样！

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: 不是因为我乐意才坐下的～

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: 要不你也坐下来休息一下？

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: 其实，对主人命令感到厌烦而已。

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: 是在关心我才让休息的吗…主人真好。

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: 怎么？你想用主人的身份来压我？

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: 主人你自己做错了，干嘛对我发火！

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: 我凭什么要挨你的训呢？

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: 下次不会这样了，原谅我一次吧。

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: 主人，没看到我的眼泪吗，原谅我吧……

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: 别看我这样，对这种话我还是有反应的！

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: 有时我也觉得自己很可爱

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: 你的心意我懂，可你不该对着我说呀

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: 你别以为我会被那种话所糊弄。

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: 即便如此，我对你也不感兴趣

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: 像我这么有魅力的宠物可不多见哦

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: 打扫卫生就交给主人了！！

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: 你不说，我也已经很困了

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: 我是因为想睡所以才睡的。并不是为了听你的话才睡的。

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: 都因为你，我现在睡意全无

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: 现在还不是睡觉的时候

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: 你别走，否则我会眯着眼睡的哦

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: 好吧，不过拿什么作为回报呢？你能为我做什么？

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: 你能不能让我休息一会儿？

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: 能打赢扎昆吗？我看赢不了…

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: 要按时给我吃饭，不然可能会跑掉的。

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: 看来并不是头大就聪明

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: 主人，你自己什么都不做，还每天对我指手画脚的！！

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: 别总是冷不丁地给我下命令

string.name: s2
string.value: 没资格当人类，你代替我被关进去吧！

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: 我睡下去就不想起来了

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: 我现在不是正在说话嘛

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: 你有没有嫉妒过别人呢？

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: 你想通过和我亲近，来摆脱嫉妒的纠缠吗？

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: 就让嫉妒使你远离所有人吧！！！

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: 如果你能让我产生嫉妒，那我就认可你！！！

string.name: s4
string.value: 魔族也懂得要守护自己在乎的东西。

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: (应该坐下来并保持安静，装作谁都不在～)

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: 坐下来对减肥没什么好处……

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: 我腿短……所以站着和坐着没区别吧？

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: 你知不知道坐在空中的感觉呢？

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: 一坐下就感觉到了大肚子……

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: 难道是因为肚子饿了？咋就一点力气都没有……

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: 好歹是我主人……我偶尔也要听话……

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: 主人！现在不是休息的时候！

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: (吃葡萄不吐葡萄皮……为什么不吃葡萄倒吐葡萄皮呢……)

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: 又没有做错……干嘛对我发火……

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: 你干嘛……我该怎么办……你好可怕……

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: 我活着可不是为了听这些话的……

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: 爱情是很幸福的一件事

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: 虽然很害羞，但是太好了！

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: 我看出来了，你是骗我的！

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: 主人！你得看着我说才行！

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: 这，这该让我如何是好啊……

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: 你是不是也对其他宠物这么说啊？

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: 我刚刚已经去过厕所了！

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 我便秘呀，你在戏弄我吗？？

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: 演奏竖琴真的很有意思！

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: 我想和主人你一起玩耍。

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: 我变成了人偶也不要忘了我。

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: 听说海底深处住着一个魔女……

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: 别让我做一些我不想做的事情。

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: 今天也要度过愉快的一天

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: (天上也有像我一样的天使吗？)

string.name: f4_s
string.value: 好吃得我都要流眼泪了……

string.name: s3
string.value: 你好像没资格成为我的主人！

string.name: s3
string.value: 你好像没资格成为我的主人！

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: 嗯~这样坐着感觉自己变成了一棵树~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: 托你福，让我有这种自由自在的感觉~

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: 知道啦~那你表扬我一下吧。

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: 知道了。你可真顽固啊。我听你的行了吧~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: 居然用这种口气跟我说话！

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: 我这么努力和你亲近，是不是很乖啊？

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: 请表扬我所做的努力吧~

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: 别讨厌我。我可是属于你的哦……

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: 要不要我回到幻影林地去呢？

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: 讨厌！我想照我的意思去做，关你什么事?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: 我写1000页的检讨书，你能原谅我吗？

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: 你讨厌我的话，我就没法活了……

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: 太过分了！！不管怎样都是你的错！！

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: 喵！！竟拿我当出气筒！！心情超不爽！！

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: 你就想对我说这些？真是郁闷！！

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: 我想和你亲近才那么做的~你就体谅我一下啦……

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: 用你那宽容的心原谅我一次吧~

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: 气消的话~和你亲嘴100次嘿嘿嘿~

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: 好吧好吧~凡事都是你对~我只能这么想~

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: 喵……胸口好痛，疼得我快要晕过去了~

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: 喵喵~你真的是那样想的吗？

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: 我们之间就到此为止吧~

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: 你是开玩笑的吧？不是真心话吧。我知道了。~

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: 你好好掂量掂量自己吧！！

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: 我可没心情跟你开玩笑！！

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: 一句那样的话，深深地伤害了我~

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: 要怎样你才能收回那句话呢？

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: 别讨厌我呀……太伤我心了……

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: 即便如此，我还是喜欢你~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: 为什么这样说我？我可聪明了！！

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: 我不喜欢……你这种无视我的态度！！

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: 好啦……你应该没看到我做了什么吧？

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: 难道你不懂公共道德吗？这里又不是厕所！！

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: 你想让我一天拉几次便便啊??

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: 我可不是专门便便的机器!!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: 喵~我不知道便便是啥东东~

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: 内急的时候才需要便便呢……主人，硬拉是拉不出来的。

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: 羞死我了，把头转过去嘛~

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: 我的便便跟你的脸蛋蛮像的呢~

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: 把这个带给隔壁家的狗狗吧~

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: 饭都不给我吃，还要让我便便吗？

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: 怎么能在这种公共场所……你倒是拉拉看啊！！

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: 我最讨厌硬让我拉便便的人了！！！

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: 我今天真是太帅了~连我自己都沉醉了！！

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: 整个世界好像围着我转一样~喵喵~

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: 喵~听说有个地方住着凶猛的龙……去看看吧？

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: 啊……为什么天是蓝色的呢？真伤感……

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: 啊！！随随便便就喜欢我，这怎么行啊！！！

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: 我和你不配~你还是省省吧~

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: 啊！！随随便便就喜欢我，这怎么行啊！！！
